hooks.after:bump: sed -i "s/export const version = '.*';/export const version = '${version}';/" lib/version.ts && sed -i "s/version='.*'/version='${version}'/" python/setup.py && cd frontend && npm version ${version} --no-git-tag-version && cd .. && git add frontend/package.json frontend/package-lock.json && npm run build
hooks.after:release: cd python && python3 setup.py sdist bdist_wheel && twine upload dist/*
